name: Flick n'Shoot Zombies
description:
Rescue ships are approaching hold the port untill furthur news.

Using nothing but useless everyday objects like dismember and decapitate, spinner, shoes,knife & bricks all that come at you to survive. The rules are very simple - slay the endless waves of zombies or have your brain eaten. Defend against an onslaught of zombies using different objects. With no food or guns to hand, it’s up to you to make the dead masses feel the pain until rescue ships reached.

You can unlock different items by collecting coins. Try to hit on head to get more coins and killed in one shot. Survival is now in your hands. Things will get really challenging and hard as you progress through level to level. Watch out and get your self out in a single piece by smashing zombies.

Get yourself ready for amazing battle with dead ones !

Features:
• Visually stunning graphics and 3D environment
• Intuitive touch screen controls that are easy to play
• Best quality audio and video effects
• Variety of Challening levels
• Tons of different items to support your survival
